channel.title: My source wont work!?!?
channel.description:
1. ok i looked on google and found a good guide (i belive) http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/make-rsps-603179/ (not to be advatising) ok once you looked on the site and see what i see. you will understand better. i did exactly what it said on the site except for portforwarding and doing the no-ip thingy. but i download the source cheezscape and i copy and paste the information provided on the site exactly on the cheezscape compile and runeserver. i clicked on edit and paste exactly what was on the site. but when i did all that my source wouldnt work. when i double click on compile this is what i get "client.java:10656: error: non-static method killServer() cannot be referenced fr om a static context server.killServer(); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Error: Could not find or load main class server Press any key to continue . . ."
and when i double click on "runserver" the what looks to be Cmd open up really fast and exit out by itself really fast. please help!!
2. also i download the source "testscape" that was on the site also and when i double click on compile this is what i get "Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594" when i also click on "runserver" same thing happends. it exit out really fast. please help!

item.title: My source wont work!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

SORRY ABOUT POSTING IN THE WRONG SECTION. I HAVE RE-POSTED THIS THREAD HERE . (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,524463.0.html)

Read full topic

item.title: My source wont work!?!?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“Army123, post:3, topic:421685”]oh ok. i figured out how to fix the client closing really fast. i forgot to add pause. but after i did that this error poped on on the client cmd.
“‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .”[/quote]

Set your classpath or change “java” to “location_of_java\bin\javac.exe” with quotes included.

Read full topic

item.title: My source wont work!?!?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

go into client.java and go to line 10656, remove server.killServer();

and in your runserver right click edit, and replace “exit” by “pause” so u can see whats wrong

Read full topic

item.title: My source wont work!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

  1. ok i looked on google and found a good guide (i belive) http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/make-rsps-603179/ (not to be advatising)
    ok once you looked on the site and see what i see. you will understand better. i did exactly what it said on the site except for portforwarding and doing the no-ip thingy. but i download the source cheezscape and i copy and paste the information provided on the site exactly on the cheezscape compile and runeserver. i clicked on edit and paste exactly what was on the site.
    but when i did all that my source wouldnt work.
    when i double click on compile this is what i get
    “client.java:10656: error: non-static method killServer() cannot be referenced fr
    om a static context
    server.killServer();
    ^
    Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
    Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
    1 error
    Error: Could not find or load main class server
    Press any key to continue . . .”

and when i double click on “runserver” the what looks to be Cmd open up really fast and exit out by itself really fast.
please help!!

  1. also i download the source “testscape” that was on the site also and when i double click on compile this is what i get
    “Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
    Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
    Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594”
    when i also click on “runserver” same thing happends. it exit out really fast. please help!

Read full topic
